validator

Class HaveIBeenPawned

  • java.lang.Object
    • validator.HaveIBeenPawned

  • public class HaveIBeenPawned
extends java.lang.Object
    Have I Been Pawned file basically checks about EMail ID's on https://haveibeenpwned.com/ for Security Breaches Please Ignore throws Exception instead of handling them via try catch blocks
    Author:
    Pawankumar Dubey

      • HaveIBeenPawned

        public HaveIBeenPawned(java.lang.String inifile)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor of the Class HaveIBeenPawned i.e. First default method to be executed. Responsible for initialization of all declared variable. Mostly it gets most of its data from config file that has to be as input from user using the Executable Jar.
        Parameters:
        inifile - Configuration File Base where all required initialization parameters are stored.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If Ini File path is not present

      • updateXlSX

        public void updateXlSX(java.lang.String email_u,
                       java.lang.String status_u,
                       java.lang.String detail_u)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Method is useful to update entries against EMail ID for Status Result and Detailed Description from Website
        Parameters:
        email_u - EMail ID as Reference for Update
        status_u - Status Update for EMail ID i.e. Passed Or Failed
        detail_u - Detail for EMail ID Status based on output from Website.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If xlsxpath is not present

      • validate_all_pawns

        public void validate_all_pawns()
                        throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Loops over EMail list and calls validate_single_pawn with single EMail ID's Return data is sent to update XlSX for reporting purpose.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If Thread.Sleep is interrupted inside validate_single_pawn Method
        java.io.IOException - If xlsxpath is not present inside updateXlSX Method

      • validate_single_pawn

        public org.javatuples.Triplet<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String> validate_single_pawn(java.lang.String email)
                                                                                                throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                                                                                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method is independent to run email ids on HaveIbeenPawned.com and return its data back as Triplet Class
        Parameters:
        email - Email to be checked for Pawn
        Returns:
        Triplet's String,String,String or null
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - If numeric conversion of String Sleep from ini fails
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If Thread.Sleep is interrupted
